concept.description: Labels all Java types which are annotated by org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.QueryModel as :JMolecules:CQRS:QueryModel.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a)-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotation:Type) WHERE annotation.fqn = "org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.QueryModel" SET t:JMolecules:CQRS:QueryModel RETURN t AS QueryModel

concept.description: Labels all Java types which are annotated by org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.Command as :JMolecules:CQRS:Command.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(c:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a)-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotation:Type) WHERE annotation.fqn = "org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.Command" SET c:JMolecules:CQRS:Command WITH p, c, a OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS]->(namespace:Value{name: "namespace"}) SET c.commandNamespace = coalesce(namespace.value, p.fqn) WITH c, a OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS]->(name:Value{name: "name"}) SET c.commandName = coalesce(name.value, c.name) RETURN c AS Command

concept.description: Labels all Java methods which are annotated by org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.CommandHandler as :JMolecules:CQRS:CommandHandler.
concept.cypher: MATCH (handler:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotation:Type) WHERE annotation.fqn = "org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.CommandHandler" SET handler:JMolecules:CQRS:CommandHandler RETURN handler AS CommandHandler

concept.description: Creates a relationship between :CommandHandler-nodes and :Command-nodes when the handler handles the command based on information provided by the annotation.
concept.cypher: MATCH (handler:JMolecules:CQRS:CommandHandler)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a)-[:OF_TYPE]->(:Type{fqn: "org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.CommandHandler"}), (a)-[:HAS]->(namespace:Value{name: "namespace"}), (a)-[:HAS]->(name:Value{name: "name"}) WITH handler, namespace.value AS namespace, name.value AS name MATCH (command:JMolecules:CQRS:Command) WHERE (namespace = "*" OR namespace = command.commandNamespace) AND (name = "*" OR name = command.commandName) MERGE (handler)-[:HANDLES]->(command) RETURN handler AS Handler, command AS Command

concept.description: Creates a relationship between :CommandHandler-nodes and :Command-nodes when the handler handles the command based on the method parameters.
concept.cypher: MATCH (command:JMolecules:CQRS:Command), (handler:JMolecules:CQRS:CommandHandler)-[:HAS]->(:Parameter)-[:OF_TYPE]->(command) MERGE (handler)-[:HANDLES]->(command) RETURN handler AS Handler, command AS Command

concept.description: Labels all Java methods which are annotated by org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.CommandDispatcher as :JMolecules:CQRS:CommandDispatcher.
concept.cypher: MATCH (dispatcher:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotation:Type) WHERE annotation.fqn = "org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.CommandDispatcher" SET dispatcher:JMolecules:CQRS:CommandDispatcher RETURN dispatcher AS CommandDispatcher

concept.description: Creates a relationship between :CommandDispatcher-nodes and :Command-nodes when the dispatcher dispatches the command based on information provided by the annotation.
concept.cypher: MATCH (dispatcher:JMolecules:CQRS:CommandDispatcher)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a), (a)-[:OF_TYPE]->(:Type{fqn: "org.jmolecules.architecture.cqrs.annotation.CommandDispatcher"}), (a)-[:HAS]->(dispatches:Value{name: "dispatches"}) WITH dispatcher, dispatches.value AS dispatches, a MATCH (command:JMolecules:CQRS:Command) WHERE dispatches = command.commandNamespace + "." + command.commandName MERGE (dispatcher)-[:DISPATCHES]->(command) RETURN dispatcher, command
